p: The results of the Fe 2+ chelating activity assay showed that Vo-S, Vo-STB and Vo-C extracts interfered with the formation of the ferrous-ferrozine complex starting from the concentration of 0.5 mg/mL, displaying at the maximum tested dose (2 mg/mL) an activity slightly lower than that of the standard EDTA, whereas Vo-in vivo exhibited weak chelating effects only at the concentration of 1 and 2 mg/mL ( Figure 7). According to the calculated IC 50 values, Vo-S was found to be the most effective, followed by Vo-C (IC 50 = 0.767 mg/mL and 0.908 mg/mL).
